Name: Horror Vacui
Description: Nature abhors a vacuum. Expect almost anything. Inspired by Lx2, Send It, and Tsunami. H6x4 Base with H7 grunts. MEV, DEA, and NEM are REQUIRED. Bitfix-based aggro cap of 64 in mind. Disable Special Swarms and season content. v1.2.0: New Lacerator NormalWave. Increased Knight's Explosive Resistance and Deceleration Speed. Increased Nomad cooldown rarity slightly to abate some spam. Removed unused Minibulk - it will return one day.

Messages.Message: You're absolutely right! That was a terrible idea.
